ygData.subject: Re: [shadowknight] RE: Possible Hunting Grounds
ygData.msgSnippet: I can t do unrest because I play on a Team PvP server. I ve still never hunted there. I also won t hunt in Mistmoor because I still someday want to have enuff
ygData.messageBody:
I can't do unrest because I play on a Team PvP server. I've still never
hunted there. I also won't hunt in Mistmoor because I still someday want to
have enuff faction to walk around freely in there. I found that there are
some peck NPC's in the mino caves past Meldrath that increase MM faction
past that of the Bard's. Although they are low low green to me by now so I
don't know If I have the patience for it.

I hated oasis too but you will find no better xp from 13-20. (Of course
again this is on a Racewar server and is controlled by evils with a max of
30 or so in the zone along the beach.

also in mid 30-mid 40 you can do spectres in oasis or Feerot.



Squig
